Question
========

A person achieves a score of 10.9 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 8.7 with a standard deviation 3.2. The z-score of the person with 10.9 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -0.73
* 0
* 0.69

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.73: Incorrect
* 0: Incorrect
* 0.69: Correct
